title: 2008 Campaign logos update: McCain TV designers tweak logo.
content: Take a look at John McCain’s logo. Then watch for it at the end of [his campaign videos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017093147/http:/www.johnmccain.com/tvads/). Notice a difference?
author: blank

comments.content: From Optima (quite dull) to an extremely dull face that I can't be bothered to try and id! Sort of sums up political advertsing in the United States I suppose though.........dull!
